entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 19 with temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High minus 19 with temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
